abstract: The Giants' recent games seem to boil down to one person: the raw receiver Victor Cruz.
snippet: The Giants' recent games seem to boil down to one person: the raw receiver Victor Cruz.
lead_paragraph: Giants  games boil down to Victor Cruz. At least it has seemed that way recently. He caught two touchdown passes to help beat the Eagles. He lived to tell the tale of laying the ball on the turf even though he wasn't touched against Arizona. And he had a spectacular catch against the Seahawks but also played a role in two crucial turnovers.

headline.main: The Victor Cruz Show, the Good and the Ugly
